ActJudges Act
SubjectPatricia Vickers ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. David H. Vickers
PrecisGranting of an annuity to PATRICIA VICKERS, widow of the Honourable David H. Vickers, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective November 15 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
